name: The Little Perpetual Errand Boy
description:
Life as an errand boy, forever! That's the curse placed on Errand Boy as he is somehow transported into a mean king's castle! Will he be stuck like that forever or will he find a way to break the curse?

Hello! This is my Ludum Dare 47 submission. This is my first game jam and it's been a thrill, albeit pretty tiring. Since this is my first game jam, I may have bitten off more than I can chew when deciding my game so this might be broken in some places. Regardless, I put tons of effort into it and hope you enjoy it!
